prompt: A turquoise blue towel and a smooth umbrella
negative_prompt: a yellow towel and a rainbow umbrella
a smooth turquoise blue towel and a smooth umbrella
long_prompt: A turquoise blue towel, its soft fabric absorbing the last drops of rain from a gentle rainstorm, lies neatly folded on a wooden deck beside a smooth, elegant umbrella, its slender shaft curved gracefully as it stands against a weathered wooden railing overlooking a tranquil, mist-shrouded lake.

A turquoise blue, plush beach towel lies spread out on a sun-drenched beach towel rack, beneath a sleek, smooth umbrella providing shade, with gentle ocean waves lapping at the shoreline and a warm breeze carrying the scent of saltwater and coconut.

A turquoise blue towel draped over a smooth wooden railing, catching the gentle breeze as a soft rain patters against the windowpane, with a sleek, modern umbrella standing upright nearby, its canopy closed and waiting for the rain to stop.
negative_long_prompt: A vibrant yellow towel, its soft fabric absorbing the first rays of sunlight after a refreshing shower, lies neatly folded on a wooden deck beside a rainbow-hued umbrella, its slender shaft curved gracefully as it stands against a weathered wooden railing overlooking a tranquil, mist-shrouded lake.

A smooth, shiny turquoise blue umbrella lies folded on a beach towel rack, beneath a plush, turquoise blue beach towel, with gentle ocean waves lapping at the shoreline and a warm breeze carrying the scent of saltwater and coconut.

A sleek, modern umbrella standing upright on a smooth wooden floor, its canopy closed and waiting for the rain to stop, beside a vibrant turquoise blue towel draped over a wooden railing, its soft fabric glistening with droplets of rainwater.
